html:
3.21.21  5:42 am   What made you decide to combine a stock image of railroad tracks with a colorful cartoony train and the word "train" at the beginning of the "long long long journey" video?

      just trying to get by

3.21.21  4:41 am   What is your favourite font?

      cupcakes

3.21.21  2:47 am   7.19.16 4:12 pm whoah you mentioned here comes the sun in 2016 that's mindblowing

      it was written mostly in 2010 and 2012

3.21.21  2:40 am   How do you draw your stuff in your videos so nicely?

     my secret is to draw them not nice, and then use interesting phrases to distract, and maybe hypnotize the viewer

     When i try to draw, even with a wacom tablet which is *supposed* to make it easier, when i draw my drawings are never accurate. Any tips or novices like me?

     i don't recall ever doing an accurate drawing

3.21.21  2:13 am   um okay so hi person I look up to quite a bit idk if you'll see this but I kinda need some life advice and I don't know who else I can talk to but uhhh: I've always known that I am the kind of person who HAS to be producing some kind of creative output, whether it's something like art or dancing or getting a job... like I just kind of have to DO something with my life you know?? the problem is that I'm not skilled in any sort of particular area and I know that I need to pick something to do and then stick to it

     wait, that's not true. One of the coolest things about our universe is the way things can change

     but I just don't know what??? I consume and consume all the sights and events and media around me and I have all of these thoughts and desire to do SOMETHING

     yes, this is good. you are getting charged up. You will probably experience some high passions and maybe a lot of envy and jealous rage, at this time. jealous of the people whose content you are consuming, because you really would like to be the one creating the content. At least that has been my experience

      but I can't figure out what to channel it into. Once I figure out what I should be doing I know I'll put my blood, sweat, and tears into it but I just can't find a starting point. I'm also at the age where I need to start planning what to do with my life

     that's every age

      and how to make money and shit but I just disappoint everyone who wants things from me because I can't stay motivated because I just don't have a PURPOSE. I just wish I had something I could be proud of and that I could be respected or respect myself for, something I poured all this energy I have inside me into, something that I can die with satisfaction knowing that I did.

     with the amount of passion you have already demonstrated, you are going to find this in copious quantities, throughout your life. When in this moment it may seem like these 'purposes' are in 0 places, pretty soon you will find them in infinite places. infinity has a weird tendency to look like 0 sometimes. i think the first step is to be aware of this fact (at least it was for me). which is to realize that massive possibilities and potential exists literally everywhere, in everything. For me, i've dedicated my life to proving this, but before i felt like i had done it, i was always searching for any time i felt like someone else had proved it, and latch onto that and study it and use it as proof that it can be done.

     I don't even know what kind of advice you could give me lol, but honestly if you have any thoughts or anything at all it would be really cool :)

      I feel i should probably stop telling everyone to "write" a lot, because maybe some people just don't enjoy witing. But .... for you, it seems like you are perfectly comfartable writing, as you've just demonstrated. So i think you should find your most comfortable writing tool (a text editor on a computer, wherever you are most comfortable writing/typing), and just start.... USING it. Do anything you can in it. Use it to be honest. Use it to paint pictures. i don't care what you use it for, .... anywhere between honesty and art, fiction to diagrams, .... i mean, just test the keyboard, to start out with. Make sure every key is working. This will be one of the simplest ways to get your brain to start putting things into the world. Basically what we need to do is open up these pathways so your brain can start communicating with the world and putting things out there. you've demonstrated clearly that you are in the sort of 'consuming' stage, with some pent up desire to be the one on the other end of that. Maybe watch some film directors interviews on youtube. That could be a starting place. You might not want to direct films, but it might remind you of something else you do want to do. But another thing i should remind you, finding these things is like a river. You just make your best guess and do a thing, and then along the way you will hear some signals that will give you another hint of what you should try next. Trust me, these rivers ALWAYS get to huge dank oceans, eventually, if you let them flow. And you have made it clear that you have a huge amount of water to start with

3.20.21  11:03 pm   Are you suprised by this surprise?

      no

3.20.21  9:58 pm   do you intentionally try to make your lyrics humorous or do they just turn out that way because they're so creative and unexpected

      i try to make them ........ good. But sometimes you have to sacrifice one and make it bad in order to make the next one good. Also the music plays a massive role in the whole thing

3.20.21  8:45 pm   Will we see the video in the next week?

      yes

3.20.21  8:31 pm   3.19.21  7:26 pm I'm not the person who asked this, but what would you say are some good ways to disguise wisdom?

      could be on a street sign

3.20.21  7:30 pm   I've been watching your videos for at least 4 or more years and am just now learning this page exists. Not only does it exist, but it's alive and thriving. BILL. What should I eat for breakfast tomorrow?

      the same thing as yesterday UNLESS you really hate it

3.20.21  7:14 pm   Do you or have you ever had an issue with your ego getting too big because of the high number of views you get and all the people who ask questions or post comments that include them saying how much they love your music?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     I've heard people sometimes have a problem with that. Or is the only opinion that matters to you in relation to your videos and music yours?

      the most important thing to remember is that i still haven't yet done most of my best work

3.20.21  7:05 pm   What's your opinion on walls?

      they are adorable

3.20.21  6:45 pm   would you download a car?

      sure. maybe even upload one

3.20.21  6:17 pm   how to make music???

      frowning could work

3.20.21  5:47 pm   How could your day have gone worse 

      the universe could have been destroyed

3.20.21  3:36 pm   everything i make sounds like someone else's thing. no ones going to listen to me when there are better artists that do the same thing, right? so how do i do my own thing?? how do i be ~niche~

      have you considered going directly to the center of outer space

3.20.21  3:29 pm   Are you planning on touring once this pandemic is over?

      yes but i'm also considering doing all my shows in the same venue. it's considered lucky to do that

3.20.21  3:25 pm   how do you describe yourself

      gonna have to just make some ~ A U D I O / V I S U A L    C O N T E N T ~

3.20.21  2:19 pm   what does the drum notation look like for here comes the sun?

      probably like a book, with 1 line per page. like a conductor's score might look

3.20.21  2:19 pm   Are you still groovy on mondays? Possibly like a pelican.

      i think of it like an open invitation, for any day

3.20.21  1:14 pm   I was thinking of locking myself in my apartment without the internet or other distractions and just focusing on my projects for a year, to see if I can make any real progress. Do you think this is a good idea?

      you might miss some important announcements, such as whether or not the world has ended

3.20.21  1:04 pm   whats your favourite chess opening?

      checkmate

3.20.21  12:37 pm   your opinion on toasters?

      they are a good literary device

3.20.21  12:31 pm   are you content with your content

      sort of

3.20.21  10:23 am   i know you like lyrics a lot for music. do you think there are some merits to music without lyrics?

      it strengthens non-musical content. Musical and non-musical content have an irrestistible attraction to each other, and when they get together, it's extremely powerful. often enough to hypnotise the customer completely

3.20.21  10:21 am   thoughts on google

      i have it bookmarked, i've been meaning to check it out

3.20.21  9:35 am   do you have ideas for questions

      yes

3.20.21  5:10 am   what is the most difficult part of making/writing music?

      remembering how easy it is

3.20.21  3:42 am   Do you draw your effects with pencil?

      no, but maybe i should

3.20.21  2:31 am   Hey Bill, you're so good at voice acting! How did you do it?

      it's helpful when you don't have to guess what the writer, director, or producer wants, nor worry about whether the editors later are going to pick the wrong take. i accomplish this by being all those people

3.19.21  11:30 pm   what if there were 61 minutes in an hour, 25 hours in a day, and 8 days in a week?

      then the minutes and hours would be shorter. assuming we are still living on the same planet

3.19.21  11:00 pm   should i buy a honda CRV or a toyota camry?

      i guess that depends on how many drumsets you think you will be carrying around

3.19.21  10:53 pm   opinion on eggs

      the fact that they are not a perfect sphere: that is a telltale sign of the volatility and wildness of life

3.19.21  10:31 pm   Any advice for someone going into high school?

      all the advice happens after you get there. any analysis you try to do before that probably won't make sense by the time you are actually there. For now, try to do something totally different, to take your mind of it so you don't overthink everything

3.19.21  10:15 pm   how would you recommend i go about making more music when i also currently have 3 jobs

      the first thing you wanna do is map out the week and figure out exactly how much time you really have. then you can let the creative negotiations begin

3.19.21  9:30 pm   Hey, Bill. So, I've reached that point in life in which I should know where I'm heading for, but I don't. I'm seventeen and apparently yesterday I couldn't choose what I'd have for lunch, but today I'm supposed to decide what to do for the rest of my life?

     there's no reason you should have to do that today. You may have known some of it since you were 6, and you may not find some of it until you are 96

     And I've had this idea in the back of my mind for years, but I feel like I used to be scared of not knowing what to do and now I'm just kinda scared of knowing I don't want to do anything. Growing up, I've developed real interst in mathematics and languages, and I always thought I'd do something related to one of these areas. But now that I actually have to choose, I don't want either.

     you don't have to choose. those are both cool things, and they are allowed to be in your life, as much or little as you want

      I live in a developing country and everything is focused in applicability: maths and languages courses are too much about applied knowledge, never seen as pure areas of study. The reason why I fell in love with maths and languages in the first place was by overanalyzing things that have no real impact in the world: I liked that they were beautiful on their own, with no need to ever be used. And the prospects for me are really negative from this point on, because I feel like every college I go to and every job available for me will be quite the opposite of that. I wish I lived in the US or Europe where pure sciences actually exist, but I don't, and I can't afford to go these places. I feel like there's nothing I want to do with the rest of my life, and yet my parents say I have to choose soon because I gotta make money somehow.

     i think you will still get a chance to do many things with your life, besides the things you do for employment. Sure, make some decisions on that now, but just make the best decision you can, based on the information you have. even if if you don't have all the information. Because you are obviously still missing at least half of the information. most people are. but you will find a lot of that information along the way. And either one you choose, you'll probably learn something. and also keep in mind that some of the most powerful things to be learned, may come from outside the 'curriculum'

      Anyway, I know this completely out of the scope of this page, I just really needed someone to talk to. I guess my question is "what should I do given that I'm a broken piece in the machine of human existence and don't seem to have any use to anyone or be able to perform any useful service to humanity, however small?"

     just taking a quick glance at the big picture here, just on the page here, it appears you seem to have some writing skills. which i can guarantee is a useful skill, in many many ways, and is still alive and thriving especially now in the internet age

3.19.21  8:43 pm   why were your videos so short in 2014-2016? i know you posted all those videos go vine back then, but some of them were literally just a single word, like hibernate, yes, test, no, whatever, sheep, bread, tape, africa, song: hello, earth, colonization, quit, ], ]], etc.

     making entire songs and videos by yourself is a pretty ridiculous task. especially if you care as much about them as i do. So it's a pretty big mindfuck. After being mindfucked for about 10 years and still not being able to do it, i found 1 weird trick which industry professionals HATE which is to start doing insanely short pieces. it helps you actually learn how to do stuff, because you get to every department before getting exhausted

      also why were you so random

     What would be an example of something less 'random'

3.19.21  7:41 pm   on expert mode, it says that there was a video called "VACATIONING IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUN"

     that's not true

      made in 1.2.20 with no link to it. Was this a video you made in 2020 that you just deleted or privated? Or was this just a teaser for "here comes the sun" that you decided to put on this website last year?

      this is probably why it's called the expert page. the inclusion of different types of content can get a bit dicey for some readers. Where as, a page like the "videos" page might be a little easier because you know what kind of content you're getting, and the rules are a bit more firmly established

3.19.21  7:26 pm   i really love visiting this page because sometimes i need to hear wisdom from someone like you who is creative and knows how to think outside of the box. you tend to answer things in a way that just clicks with my brain. you say some things in such a straight forward and simple way and it makes me go, ah, there it is. the thing i needed to hear. Thanks for everything, i owe you my life

      pay someone else instead, with wisdom, if they need it. Or, you can try giving wisdom to someone who doesn't want wisdom but you may have to disguise the wisdom

3.19.21  7:25 pm   Is it possible to output art in numerous forms and continually take on projects that are stupidly ambitious all the time and be successful?

     yes but there might also be a lot of personal failures mixed in

     And also is it reasonable to try and make 3D galleries in games into a respected medium?

      sure

3.19.21  6:11 pm   Where were you when you discovered that A7 b9 is also Gdim7/A

      at home, for sure

3.19.21  6:08 pm   are you planning on ever making a whole album?

      i would prefer to release the songs individually, and do many more than would normally go on an album

3.19.21  4:58 pm   when will darkness cover the earth?

      at night it tends to cover half

3.19.21  4:02 pm   how do you answer so many queries? I would have thought getting all these messages would mess up an artists mindset/mojo. why do you do it? thank you

      it can increase my communication skills

3.19.21  3:17 pm   202103191218 Albums are digital now, you can put as mamy songs on as you like

      ok, but, can you add songs to them after they are released? or do you have to just postpone the album forever until you've made all the songs?

3.19.21  2:24 pm   is there something you wish there was a word for?

      yes, BUT, words are so powerful you can pretty much get a word for anything you want

3.19.21  1:43 pm   i always that that when you said "i'm just trying to be reasonable" that you were joking around. but, the way you said it in an interview seemed like you were actually being serious.

some of your other answers to a similar question confused me. but, as of now i think it just means that you're getting by just trying to make something. it's just what came to you in the moment using the tools that you had. and, you just kept adding to what you knew and what came naturally. and, that's what being reasonable means, right? it's just a linear progression of what you have, know, and do creatively. it's my perception at the moment.

does that seem like something you'd agree with? 

      it's sort of like when you are in a room, and you want to go to the next room. and there appears to be a door going between them. the first thing to try, might be to go through that door. that's sort of an example of what i might consider reasonable. Then if someone asks, later, 'can you explain your reasoning on going through that door', then you might say that you were just trying to be reasonable. hopefully you see what i'm getting at

3.19.21  1:10 pm   what is the least complicated word you know

      i don't know any complicated words

3.19.21  12:18 pm   are you planning on ever making a whole album?

      no, but i'm planning on making many more songs than could ever fit on an album

3.19.21  11:37 am   what's the biggest prime number?

      backstreet boys voice: "it's gotta be you"
